articles.author: Aaron Bailey
articles.title: United Airlines Cancels 35 Roundtrip Flights From Newark After ATC Staffers Take Leave - Simple Flying
articles.description: United Airlines makes the decision to cancel 35 daily Newark flights after FAA staffing crises and tech outages.
articles.content:
Chicago-based United Airlines has announced plans to cancel approximately 35 daily round-trip flights from its hub at Newark Liberty International Airport
(EWR). This comes following a walk-out by a… [+3847 chars]
